词条:淡水湖淡水湖(Freshwater Lake)是指以淡水形式积存在地表上的湖泊,有封闭式和开放式两种。中国著名的五大淡水湖为鄱阳湖、洞庭湖、太湖、洪泽湖和巢湖,世界.

entry.tran: (湖)淡水的;(生物)淡水中生长的
entry.def: A freshwater lake contains water that is not salty, usually in contrast to the sea. Freshwater creatures live in water that is not salty.

example.ex: ...Lake Balaton, the largest freshwater lake in Europe...
example.tran: 巴拉顿湖，欧洲最大的淡水湖

example.ex: The perch is a freshwater fish.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or living in or consisting of water that is not salty;
